video: gource -1280x720 -i 0 --date-format "%Y-%m-%d" --highlight-users --seconds-per-day 0.4 -r 30 --title "Thank you to everyone who has contributed to taro-qn-component !" -o - | ffmpeg -y -r 30 -f image2pipe  -vcodec ppm -i - -i friendships.mp3 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 1 -threads 0 -bf 0 contribution.mp4
video2: gource -1920x1080 -i 0 --date-format "%Y-%m-%d" --highlight-users --seconds-per-day 0.4 -r 30 --title "Thank you to everyone who has contributed to taro-qn-component !" -o - | ffmpeg -y -r 30 -f image2pipe  -vcodec ppm -i - -i friendships.mp3 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -pix_fmt yuv420p -crf 1 -threads 0 -bf 0 contribution.mp4
